trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Everett
There was one other sighting in Everett on or around March 17th 2013
Summary: lights in the sky to the south of us moving slowly north
divs: Sighting Details Odd light in the sky moving in a north direction. Had to be below cloud covering just barely.I guess maybe 500ft. Called my girl friend out and she was a little freaked when she saw it.Never seen anything like that before.Definatly not a plane.It was moving slowly.Much slower than a plane would.Not a helicopter either.weird.Then it disappeared in the clouds.Watched to see if it would appear again but it didnt.
